attributes.action: The signatories believe the Saudi Royal family should be banned from UK entry
attributes.additional_details:
The Home Secretary has said that coming to the UK is a privilege and not a right and she will continue to use the powers available to prevent from entering the UK those who seek to harm our society and who do not share our basic values.

In light of the recent executions in Saudi Arabia, it is very clear that Saudi Arabia do not share the basic values of the United Kingdom and therefore the Saudi Royal family should be banned from entry to the United Kingdom.
attributes.background: In light of the recent executions in Saudi Arabia, it's very clear that Saudi Arabia don't share the same basic values of the UK. The UK values freedom of speech including the freedom to criticize the Government. Sheikh Nimr al-Nimr was executed due to his  staunch critic of the Saudi leadership
